title: Oneida Moda Teaspoons, Set of 4,Silver
features: INCLUDES: This Oneida silverware set contains (4) teaspoons. The Moda line was designed for the finest homes and restaurants.

CLASSIC AND MODERN DESIGN: This teaspoon set is all about symmetry. Modern elegance creates a versatility that gets you the most out of what you buy. Make a statement without pretension. Make it Moda.
HIGHEST QUALITY: What distinguishes silverware to the touch? Finish and weight. These expertly crafted teaspoons are mirror finished and heavy in the hand. The result? Perfection.
FINEST STAINLESS STEEL: Silverware is all about metals. 18/10 stainless-steel silverware is made from the world’s best. Impervious to rust and tough, buy what lasts a lifetime – or even more.
LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY: Buy once. Impress for years. This set of teaspoons will last through all dinners and dishwashers. That’s our promise.
description: The creation of a unique and unforgettable dining experience – this is Oneida’s mission. Attempts to achieve our ideal over the last nearly 150 years have made us the tabletop industry leader. Since 1880, Oneida has been, and continues to be, a synonym for luxury. There’s silverware. And then there’s Oneida. Satin or mirror, modern or classic, simple or ornate – we have the perfect fit for any restaurant or household. This pattern is 18/10 stainless steel. Built to last a lifetime, the finest metals mean maximum durability and rust resistance. The result is luxury you can hold.
